General.Name: Chzpsn-Profnastil OAO
General.Description: Public joint stock company Chelyabinsk plant of the profiled steel decking produces and sells building structures and materials for rolled metal products in Russia. It offers wall and roof sandwich panels, metal tiles, roofing, wall, corrugated board, painting rolled steel, shaped elements, strips, and related products, as well as block container and mineral wool insulation. The company was founded in 1974 and is based in Chelyabinsk, Russia. Public joint stock company Chelyabinsk plant of the profiled steel decking operates as a subsidiary of AO Stroysistema.
